noPlayer: ‚ùó There is no active player in this server.
noQuery: ‚ùó Please provide a search query or a URL to play.
noChannel: ‚ùó You need to be in a voice channel to use this command.
noPrevious: ‚ùó There are no previous tracks in the queue.
noTrack: ‚ùó There are no tracks in the queue.
noLyrics: ‚ùó Could not find lyrics for this track.
notConnected: ‚ùó You are not connected to <#{{channel}}> to use these buttons.
loadFailed: ‚ùó Failed to load the requested track.
noSource: ‚ùó Provided source "{{source}}" isn't available. try with another one.
emptyResult: ‚ùó No tracks found for the query.
invalidSeekFormat: ‚ùó Invalid time format. Examples: seek 1m, seek 1h 30m
beyondDuration: ‚ùó Cannot seek beyond the track duration of {{duration}}.
notReplayable: ‚ùó Cannot replay this track as it is not seekable.
invalidTrackNumber: ‚ùó Please provide a valid track number.
addPlaylist: ‚úÖ  Added `{{size}}` tracks to the queue from `{{title}}`.
selectTrack: Please select the track you want to play.
noFile: ‚ùó Please attach an audio file to play.
invalidFormat: ‚ùó You can only play MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, AAC or M4A files.
corruptedFile: ‚ùó Failed to play the audio file. It may be corrupted.
title: Title
author: Author
stop: Stopped the player and cleared the queue.
removed: Removed track number {{number}} from the queue.
needDjRole: You need to have the **DJ Role** to use this command.

setupStart.error_searching: There was an error while searching.
setupStart.queue_too_long: The queue is too long. The maximum length is {maxQueueSize} tracks.
setupStart.playlist_too_long: The playlist is too long. The maximum length is {maxPlaylistSize} tracks.
setupStart.added_playlist_to_queue: Added [{length}] tracks from the playlist to the queue.
